page.title: 16Harlington
page.content:
The area is quiet except for the airport which has planes taking off every minute. The sports ground has facilities for cricket, athletics and football. Harlington Road is busy and has lots of shops and businesses on it. It also has lots of housing. Near Hayes station is a lot of industry. There is a motorway passing through Harlington called the M4. There are sand and gravel works nearby. They take the sand and gravel and use it for something else; then they fill up the pit using waste materials. Outside Harlington is some farmland where they were growing oats and other cereal crops.
by Geeta Gondalia
